overview: A tale of two male hunks undergoing the different stages of realization and of falling in and out of love.  Their story reels off in their minds and is carried out in a rather sensual and provocative manner.  What actually goes on...?  And what are the complexities in the process of carrying out, staying in and moving on from this kind of relationship?  Masterfully crafted as the previous M2M features- this video shows the intricacies and dynamics of male to male relationship.
title: M2M 3: Versus
